meaningMnemonic:
Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>worship</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to worship</vocabulary>.

拝む generally means <vocabulary>to pray to</vocabulary> a deity, spirit, or revered object while assuming a worshipping position, such as bowing or clasping one's hands together in prayer. Additionally, 拝む can also mean <vocabulary>to see</vocabulary> with a sense of respect and reverence.
readingMnemonic: You have <vocabulary>to worship</vocabulary> the <reading>ogre</reading> (おが), because if you don't it'll eat your face off.
